item.title: 伊拉克停电与关税担忧冲突，油价变化不大
item.description: 由于担心无人机袭击伊拉克北部油田会减少供应，同时又担心美国关税政策的不确定性可能导致需求下降，周五油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Friday after rising in the previous session as concerns drone attacks on northern Iraqi oil fields will cut supply vied with worries of potential demand declines amid uncertainty in U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: 花旗集团与蚂蚁金服国际公司为客户试点人工智能外汇工具，帮助降低对冲成本
item.description: 花旗集团和新加坡金融科技公司蚂蚁金服（Ant International）周五表示，两家公司已推出一项试点计划，利用人工智能帮助客户更好地管理外汇风险。【原文：Citigroup and Singapore-based financial technology firm Ant International have launched a pilot program using artificial intelligence to help clients better manage foreign exchange risk, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，日元在日本投票前走软
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，原因是依然强劲的美国经济数据和强劲的企业盈利抵消了关税忧虑，而日元则在日本上议院选举前连续第二周下跌。【原文：Asian shares tracked Wall Street higher on Friday as still-strong U.S. economic data and robust corporate earnings offset tariff worries, while the yen headed toward a second successive week of loss ahead of Japan's upper house election.】

item.title: 美国数据坚挺，美联储宽松押注减弱，美元将迎来周线上涨
item.description: 美元兑主要同业货币连续第二周上涨，原因是一些稳健的美国经济数据支持了美联储可以再等一段时间再降息的观点。【原文：The dollar headed for a second straight weekly gain against major peers, buoyed by some solid U.S. economic data that supported the view the Federal Reserve can afford to wait a while longer before cutting interest rates again.】

item.title: 加拿大部长表示，加拿大希望通过南方共同市场贸易协定减少对美国的依赖
item.description: 加拿大国际贸易部长周四表示，双方都有兴趣推进与南美集团南方共同市场（Mercosur）的贸易谈判，因为渥太华正在寻求新的交易，以推动从美国向多元化发展。【原文：Canada's International Trade Minister said on Thursday that there was interest from both sides to advance trade talks with South American bloc Mercosur, as Ottawa seeks new deals in a push to diversify from the U.S.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Meta 在挖走两名苹果人工智能研究人员的老板后，又聘用了他们
item.description: 据彭博社周四援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 公司的超级智能实验室团队已经聘请了苹果公司的人工智能研究人员马克-李（Mark Lee）和汤姆-冈特（Tom Gunter）。【原文：Meta Platforms has hired Apple AI researchers Mark Lee and Tom Gunter for its Superintelligence Labs team, Bloomberg news reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Netflix 称在阿根廷电视剧中使用了 GenAI
item.description: Netflix 周四表示，该公司使用生成式人工智能制作的视觉效果首次出现在其一部原创剧集的屏幕上。【原文：Netflix said on Thursday that it used generative artificial intelligence to produce visual effects that appeared for the first time on screen in one of its original series, employing a technology that has been a source of anxiety throughout Hollywood.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚广播公司取消斯蒂芬-科尔伯特的深夜节目，称这是 "财务 "决定
item.description: 该节目是美国广播电视中收视率最高的深夜节目，也是经常讽刺特朗普的平台。科尔伯特周四告诉观众，他是在前一天晚上得知节目被取消的。【原文：The show is the most-watched late-night program on U.S. broadcast television and a frequent platform of satire aimed at Trump. Colbert told his audience on Thursday that he was informed of his show's cancellation the night before.】

item.title: 必和必拓第四季度铁矿石产量超出预期，皮尔巴拉地区表现强劲
item.description: 必和必拓集团周五公布的第四季度铁矿石产量好于预期，并达到了 2025 财年铁矿石和铜产量指导目标的上限，这得益于其皮尔巴拉中部枢纽的供应链优势。【原文：BHP Group on Friday reported better-than-expected iron ore output for the fourth quarter and hit the upper end of guidance for both iron ore and copper output in fiscal 2025, helped by supply-chain strength at its central Pilbara hub.】

item.title: 尽管中国减持美国国债，但外国持有的美国国债在五月份仍有所增加
item.description: 美国财政部周四公布的数据显示，5月份外国持有的美国国债增加，连续第三个月超过9万亿美元，在4月份关税动荡导致资金外流之后，除中国以外的买家纷纷回流。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries increased in May to top $9 trillion for a third straight month, data from the Treasury Department showed on Thursday, with buyers, other than China, flocking back in after tariff turmoil led to outflows in April.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，巴西 Vibra 开始洽谈收购 Cosan 的润滑油业务部门
item.description: 据当地新闻媒体《巴西日报》周四援引熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道，巴西燃料零售商 Vibra 开始与巴西企业集团 Cosan 就收购 Cosan 的润滑油部门 Moove 进行谈判。【原文：Brazilian fuel retailer Vibra began talks with Brazilian conglomerate Cosan to buy Cosan's lubricants arm, Moove, local news outlet Brazil Journal reported on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔再次提出 7 月降息的理由
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周四表示，他仍然认为美国央行应在本月底下调利率目标，因为经济面临的风险越来越大，而且关税引发的通胀极有可能不会推动物价压力持续上升。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said on Thursday he continues to believe that the U.S. central bank should cut its interest rate target at the end of the month amid mounting risks to the economy and the strong likelihood that tariff-induced inflation will not drive a persistent rise in price pressures.】

item.title: 美国 ADM 关闭巴西宠物食品工厂
item.description: 总部位于美国的谷物商阿彻丹尼尔斯米德兰公司（Archer Daniels Midland）本周在回答路透社的提问时发表声明称，将关闭巴西的一家宠物食品工厂，作为精简成本和运营的广泛努力的一部分。【原文：U.S.-based grain merchant Archer Daniels Midland is closing a pet food plant in Brazil, according to a statement sent this week to Reuters in response to questions, as part of broader efforts to streamline costs and operations.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔就美联储总部翻修问题回应白宫
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周四回应了特朗普政府官员关于央行华盛顿总部园区翻新项目成本超支信息的要求，称该项目规模庞大，涉及多项安全升级和有害物质清除工作。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Thursdayresponded to a Trump administration official's demands for information about cost overruns for a renovation project at the central bank's Washington headquarters campus, saying the project was large in scope and involved a number of safety upgrades and hazardous materials removals.】

item.title: 联邦贸易委员会撤销禁止约翰-赫斯进入雪佛龙董事会的命令
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四撤销了之前的一项命令，即禁止赫斯公司首席执行官约翰-赫斯进入雪佛龙董事会，作为雪佛龙即将以 530 亿美元收购赫斯公司的条件。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Thursday reversed a previous order that had barred Hess Corp CEO John Hess from the board of directors at Chevron as a condition of the oil giant's pending $53 billion acquisition of his company.】

item.title: 医疗器械软件开发商 Heartflow 申请在美国上市
item.description: 基于人工智能的医疗设备软件开发商 Heartflow 周四在美国提交了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Heartflow, an artificial intelligence-based medical device software developer, filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Thursday.】

item.title: 交易日：经济意外，华尔街新高
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，联合太平洋公司正在探索收购诺福克南方公司的交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，铁路运营商联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific）正在探讨收购竞争对手诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）的交易。【原文：Railroad operator Union Pacific is exploring a deal to acquire rival Norfolk Southern , the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国众议院将 "天才法案 "稳定币议案交由特朗普签署
item.description: 美国众议院周四通过了一项法案，为与美元挂钩的加密代币--稳定币--建立监管框架，该法案已送交唐纳德-特朗普总统，预计他将签署该法案使之成为法律。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday passed a bill to create a regulatory framework for U.S.-dollar-pegged cryptocurrency tokens known as stablecoins, sending the bill to President Donald Trump, who is expected to sign it into law.】

item.title: 美联储大楼翻新是特朗普与鲍威尔争斗的焦点：需要了解的五件事
item.description: 美联储对位于华盛顿特区的两座历史性建筑进行了长达数年的翻修，不断攀升的费用成为特朗普政府对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔施压活动不断升级的最新热点。【原文：The spiraling cost of the Federal Reserve's years-long renovation of two historic buildings in Washington, D.C., has become the latest flashpoint in the Trump administration's escalating pressure campaign on Fed Chair Jerome Powell, whom Trump wants out of the central bank because he hasn't delivered the interest-rate cuts he wants.】

item.title: 乌贼游戏》最后一季让 Netflix 盈利超过预期
item.description: 全球现象级电影《乌贼游戏》最后一季的播出帮助 Netflix 第二季度的盈利超过了华尔街的预期目标，该流媒体服务公司也上调了今年的收入预期。【原文：The final season of global phenomenon "Squid Game" helped Netflix beat Wall Street earnings targets for the second quarter, and the streaming service raised its revenue guidance for the year.】

item.title: 美国众议院通过加密货币行业支持的市场结构法案
item.description: 美国众议院周四通过了一项法案，将为加密货币制定监管框架，并扩大商品期货交易委员会对该行业的监督。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives passed a bill on Thursday that would develop a regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies and expand the Commodity Futures Trading Commission's oversight of the industry.】

item.title: 可口可乐转用蔗糖成本高昂，损害美国农民利益
item.description: 可口可乐 以及其他饮料和食品行业使用蔗糖代替玉米糖浆作为甜味剂的举动将很难实施，而且成本高昂，同时对美国的农民来说大多是负面的。【原文：A possible move by Coca-Cola , and other beverage and food industries, to use cane sugar instead of corn syrup as a sweetener would be difficult and expensive to implement, while mostly negative for farmers in the United States.】

item.title: 卢拉称不会听命于外国人特朗普，称关税是讹诈
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周四表示，他不会在关税问题上听命于外国人，他指的是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump），并随后称美国威胁征收关税是 "不可接受的讹诈"。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Thursday said he would not take orders over tariffs from a foreigner, referring to U.S. President Donald Trump, and later called the United States' threatened duty "unacceptable blackmail."】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利称 2025 年底前两次降息 "合理
item.description: 旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周四重申，预计在今年年底前进行两次降息是 "合理的"，尤其是在唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税影响看起来比原先预期的要小的情况下。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly reiterated on Thursday it is "reasonable" to expect two interest rate cuts before the end of this year, particularly with the impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs looking more muted than originally expected.】

item.title: 通讯平台 Substack 在最新一轮融资中估值 11 亿美元
item.description: Substack通讯平台周四表示，该公司在一轮融资中筹集了1亿美元，由风险投资公司Bond和Chernin Group领投，估值11亿美元。【原文：Substack has raised $100 million in a funding round led by venture capital firms Bond and the Chernin Group at a valuation of $1.1 billion, the newsletter platform said on Thursday.】

item.title: 百事公司将重塑不含人工染料和香精的乐事和 Tostitos 品牌
item.description: 百事公司高管周四表示，该公司计划在今年晚些时候重新推出其 Lay's 和 Tostitos 品牌时，重点介绍薯片或玉米片中将不再含有的人工色素或香精。【原文：PepsiCo is planning to highlight what will no longer be in its potato or tortilla chips - artificial colors or flavors - when it re-launches its Lay's and Tostitos brands later this year, executives said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院撤销对汇丰银行高管的欺诈定罪
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周四宣布，2017 年对汇丰银行一名前高管的欺诈定罪无效，该高管曾因 "前置操作 "一家英国油气勘探公司 35 亿美元的货币交易而入狱两年。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Thursday voided the 2017 fraud conviction of a former HSBC executive who spent two years in prison for "front-running" a British oil and gas exploration company's $3.5 billion currency trade.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出 ChatGPT 代理，处理人工智能应用程序发展过程中的任务
item.description: OpenAI 周四为其流行的聊天机器人 ChatGPT 推出了一个人工智能代理，可以完成复杂的任务，这家由微软支持的初创公司希望在人工智能竞赛中领先于竞争对手。【原文：OpenAI launched an artificial intelligence agent for its popular chatbot ChatGPT on Thursday that can complete complex tasks as the Microsoft-backed startup looks to get ahead of competitors in the AI race.】

item.title: L3Harris 推出新型远程导弹，在太平洋地区瞄准中国
item.description: L3Harris Technologies 公司发布了两款新型导弹，旨在为美军提供成本更低的远程打击选择，因为美军正在补充补给，同时寻找武器来遏制中国在太平洋地区的野心。【原文：L3Harris Technologies has unveiled two new missiles that aim to provide less expensive long-range strike options for the U.S. military as it restocks its supplies while looking for arms to deter China's ambitions in the Pacific.】
